text: Ibrahim Ibrahimi (, ; born 24 December 1972) is an Afghan musician and educator, who fled his country to France«Pour les Talibans, la place de la musique et des musiciens, c’était la tombe» Daud Khan Sadozai on 20 August 2021 with 16 members of his family, to avoid the massacres of the Taliban.«Il n'y a plus d'espoir pour mon pays», rencontre avec le musicien afghan Humayoun Ibrahimi He specializes in playing tabla. Two of his sons are musicians too.«Si je n’étais pas parti, ils m'auraient tué», le témoignage du musicien afghan Ibrahim Ibrahimi ==References== == Other websites == * «Ensemble Ibrahimi», Centre international des musiques nomades site Category:1972 births Category:Afghan musicians Category:21st-century composers Category:Nangarhar Province Category:21st-century Afghan people Category:20th-century Afghan people
title: Ibrahim Ibrahimi
